question: Employer Shared Responsibility Payment (ESRP)
text:
Employer Shared Responsibility Payment (ESRP)
          
        
The Affordable Care Act requires certain employers with at least 50 full-time employees (or equivalents) to offer health insurance coverage to its full-time employees (and their dependents) that meets certain minimum standards set by the
Affordable Care Act
or to make a tax payment called the ESRP.
